system.novice: Navigator makes Opposed Willpower Test vs all living beings looking into their Warp eye (Navigator tests once, all others compare to it).  Targets that fail take 1d5+4 Levels of Fatigue, only reduced by target's Toughness Bonus. Non-living, Untouchable, or Daemonic/Warp targets are immune. Forewarned/Unaware targets have +30 on Roll to resist.
system.adept: As Novice, but also Opponent must also make -10 Fear Test (Willpower). If Navigator Fails Opposed Test they suffer two Fatigue.
system.master: As Novice, but also Opponent must also make -20 Feat test (Willpower). If Navigator Fails Opposed Test they suffer two Fatigue which can't be avoided.
